feature information -  https://bmcmedinformdecismak.biomedcentral.com/articles/10.1186/s12911-020-1023-5/tables/1
dataset - https://www.kaggle.com/andrewmvd/heart-failure-clinical-data
seaborn histograms - https://seaborn.pydata.org/tutorial/distributions.html
seaborn scatterplot - https://seaborn.pydata.org/generated/seaborn.scatterplot.html
sklearn - https://scikit-learn.org/stable/index.html
column transformer- https://scikit-learn.org/stable/modules/generated/sklearn.compose.ColumnTransformer.html#examples-using-sklearn-compose-columntransformer
